did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Administrative, tax, land, and election records for the town of Hartford.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The town of Hartford was settled in 1635 and incorporated in 1784. The city was incorporated in May 1784. Town and city consolidated in April 1896.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Administrative, tax, land, and election records for the town of Hartford.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access

p.emph: Boxes 2-3 are restricted due to condition. Please contact State Archives staff for assistance.

accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.

did.unittitle: Town Treasurers' military payment records including payments for militia service, Foot Guard and Horse Guard returns, vouchers for payment From Soldiers' Fund and Conscript Relief Fund

p.emph: Boxes 2-3 are restricted due to condition.

did.unittitle: Fire Department records including bills, Receipts, correspondence, reports and records of the Firemen's Ball Committee
Report on proposed sites for new municipal building, and blueprints

p.emph: Lists of electors are not boxed.
Volumes for 1882 to 1918 are not boxed.
Tax abstracts for 1880 to 1920 are not boxed.
